mapper.insert: insert into tbl_vacpayment (emp_code, deadline_date, type, vac_start_date, vac_end_date, vac_reason, progress_code, admin_code, admin_name,owner_code) values (#{empCode}, DATE_FORMAT(#{deadLineDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{type}, DATE_FORMAT(#{vacStartDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(#{vacEndDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{vacReason}, #{progressCode}, #{adminCode}, #{adminName},#{ownerCode})

insert into tbl_cacpayment (emp_code, deadline_date, type, cac_start_date, cac_end_date, cac_reason, account_number, progress_code, admin_code, admin_name,owner_code) values (#{empCode}, DATE_FORMAT(#{deadLineDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{type}, DATE_FORMAT(#{cacStartDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(#{cacEndDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{cacReason}, #{accountNum}, #{progressCode}, #{adminCode}, #{adminName},#{ownerCode})

insert into tbl_overtime (emp_code, deadline_date, type, overtime, overtime_reason, progress_code, admin_code, admin_name,owner_code) values (#{empCode}, DATE_FORMAT(#{deadLineDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{type}, #{overTime}, #{overTimeReason}, #{progressCode}, #{adminCode}, #{adminName},#{ownerCode})

insert into tbl_retirement (emp_code, deadline_date, type, retire_date, retire_reason, progress_code, admin_code, admin_name,owner_code) values (#{empCode}, DATE_FORMAT(#{deadLineDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{type}, DATE_FORMAT(#{retireDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{retireReason}, #{progressCode}, #{adminCode}, #{adminName},#{ownerCode})
